channel.title: Dupe method in all source's how to fix
channel.description:
Ok so iv fixed over 8 different dupe method's up to now in deltascape source, but I just been made aware of enougher one, where by when you trade and go to 2nd trade screen, the player disconnect's his internet leaving the 2nd trade screen up, then the other player accepts.
I was thinking something to check if the player is still connected or not, but as its a xlogg kind of idea Im pretty sure the server will still think there online till it times out.
Any methods of fixing this glitch would be great.

item.title: Dupe method in all source's how to fix

item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Check the date next time.
